name: Gemma 3 27B (Instruct)
description: Flagship open-source Gemma model with exceptional performance across coding, math, and reasoning tasks. Outperforms many larger proprietary models.
notes: Top-tier open-source model with Elo 1338 on LMSys Arena (Top 10). Benchmarks: MMLU 76.9, HumanEval 87.8, GSM8K 95.9, MATH 89.0. Trained on 14T tokens. Beats Gemini 1.5 Pro on multiple benchmarks. Uses SigLIP vision encoder. Available via Google AI Studio or self-hosted. 140+ language support. Requires ~21GB memory (4-bit).
